description:
1. It is never too late to fall in love.

爱永远不会嫌晚。

2.Whn the words "I love you" were said by you for the first time, my world blossoms.

第一次听到你对我说"我爱你"，我的世界一瞬间鲜花绽开。

3.To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.

对于世界而言，你是一个人；但是对于某个人，你是他的整个世界。

4.Our hours in love have wings; in absence crutches. 

爱情的时光长出了翅膀；离别时，它们是我们的精神支柱。 

5. No man or woman is worth your tears, and the one who is, won‘t make you cry.

没有男人或女人值得你为他（她）流眼泪的，值得的那一位，舍不得让你哭。

6.Maybe God wants us to meet a few wrong people before meeting the right one, so that when we finally meet the person, we will know how to be grateful.

可能神要我们在遇到对的人之前先遇上一些错的人，这样当我们遇到生命中真正的人的时候就会更懂得珍惜和感激。

7.The worst way to miss someone is to be sitting right beside them knowing you can‘t have them.

失去某人，最糟糕的莫过于，他近在身旁，却犹如远在天边。

8. With the wonder of your love, the sun above always shines.

拥有你美丽的爱情，太阳就永远明媚

9.The best proof of love is trust. 

爱的最好的证明就是信任。

10.It's difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun. 

知道爱情开始是困难的，但知道爱情已经开始则不那么困难了。
